body:
Mouhaahahaha, my third AMA, Ask Me Anything!


Questions:
evilchrizillah 
Do you wuv me?
zero9178 
How did you come up with your name ?
What does your skin represent ?
Lucawittwer 
1. What would ya wish for? (ANYTING)
2. what Chriz said.
3. Favourite colour?
4. Transformers or COWS
5. Did ya see me outside your window :O?
6. Did I lie there ^^^^?
7. Am I awesome?
8. Pepsi or Sprite?
9. ANYTHING????
10. ANYTHHHHHHHHHHHHHIIIIIIIIIIIING???????????????
11. Now ducks?
12. Hello, Hello, Hello, HELLO!?

Answers:
evilchrizillah 
maybeh
zero9178 
My skin represente hmmmmmm, me :)
This is not my account, this is my brother's friend's one, he choosed the name, he gived it to me since alpha.
Lucawittwer 
1. nothing
2.idk
3.blue
4.cows
5.yes
6.no
7.no u sux
8.fanta
9.nothing
10.nothing
11.duxhax
12.herru
